About us

We believe that by supporting companies experimenting on the verge of medicine and technology, by uniting specialists in the sphere of healthcare innovations, we help doctors and their patients to give and get treatment of the best quality, at the right time and in the place it is needed the most.

We are investing using different approaches including convertible loans and direct participation in the capital of our portfolio companies. We have several companies in our portfolio, including a distributor of medical equipment and products, and a company working in transportation and distribution of medical drugs.

FIELDS FOR INVESTMENT

  • New nuclear medicine technologies;
  • New drugs development;
  • New diagnostic tools including technologies applicable for diagnosing new type of diseases (e.g. COVID-19);
  • Advanced medical imaging technologies;
  • Medical engineering;
  • Creation of a new generation of medical facilities.

Members

Our goal is to build a network uniting investors whose desire is to make next generation medical products available to physicians and their patients all over the world and profile companies which possess necessary knowledge and experience to turn this desire into action.

We welcome new qualified members who could invest their expertise, business connections and capital in developing our portfolio companies’ business. In return our members obtain shares in our portfolio companies and direct commission fees for helping facilitate deals of our portfolio companies.
